over the winter months when 
infection rates are expected 
to increase. The vaccine will 
help protect your unborn 
baby as immunity will pass 
to	them	and	offer	short-
term protection after birth.  
The COVID-19 vaccine can 
be	given	alongside	the	flu	
vaccine, or it can be given 
separately if you prefer. 
For more on the COVID-19 
vaccination programme in 
Northern Ireland, see this link: 
www.pha.site/
